name: AP_CLAIM_PROV_RESP
description:
This table contains the provider responsibility information for AP Claim procedures.





To link this tableï¿½s service line information back to a claim header, join this table to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS on the TX_ID column. If you need to report on claim service lines specific to Cost Sharing Reduction (CSR), join this table instead to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS_CSR on the TX_ID column.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the AP Claim procedure transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the provider responsibility for this transaction record.

columns.name: PROV_RESP_AMT
columns.description: The dollar amount for a specific provider responsibility.

columns.name: EOB_CODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the EOB code used for denial so that the billed amount was routed to the provider responsibility amount.

columns.name: PROV_RESP_OVRD_AMT
columns.description: The user-entered override to the dollar amount a specific provider responsibility. If present, the value in this column overrides the value in PRV_RESP_AMT.
